snippet: Norway’s government called off a weeklong terrorism alert on Thursday, saying an attack by a militant Islamist group with combat training in Syria was no longer seen as imminent.
abstract: Norway calls off terrorism alert, saying attack by a militant Islamist group with combat training in Syria is no longer seen as imminent.
lead_paragraph: Norway’s government called off a weeklong terrorism alert on Thursday, saying an attack by a militant Islamist group with combat training in Syria was no longer seen as imminent.

headline.main: Norway: As Threat Eases, Terrorism Alert Is Called Off
headline.print_headline: Norway: As Threat Eases, Terrorism Alert Is Called Off

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
